oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ||kabbo (Jantje) (II)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A note by ||kabbo on |kannu, a 'Rain's man', who was ||kabbo's !kui or person after his father's death. |kannu was shot in the dark by his grandson (called !kauken ka |a). The story is continued on p.2264v with further details of |kannu's murder and some details of the incident. 1) See also |kannu the rainmaker (pp.6639v-6646v), 2) This story is found in Book II-25.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The death of |kannu the Rain's man who was ||kabbo's person
